name: Radisson Hotel & Suites Fort McMurray

reviews.title: Not 3 1/2 stars
reviews.text: On the plus side, fairly new property. Lobby looked real fake luxury, and was out of place in the near north, rooms were OK but kind of grey/green.

description: The Radisson Hotel & Suites Ft McMurray, in Alberta Canada, offers a selection of 134 exquisitely decorated rooms to suit all tastes throughout our two floor facility. We have several types of specialty rooms, including wheelchair accessible units, suites, and deluxe suites with fireplace and/or private whirlpool. Our distinctive suites will make any stay extra special. We have plenty of recreational options at your fingertips. Our indoor pool with spiral waterslide is great fun for all ages; or you can melt your tensions away in our bubbling hot tub. Our dedicated all-hours fitness equipment will allow you to keep on your fitness routine while on the road. We also feature: 7 meeting rooms, 1 board room, guest coin operated laundry, same day dry cleaning service, on-command movies and room service.
